comment: Корапченный член сопротивления (поднят флаг CorruptedResistants) по клику

languages.text: "Кругом предатели. Комиссар предал. Даже Император предал. Теперь-то я понимаю — кто первый предал, тот и прав".

traits.locale_text: "Кругом предатели. Комиссар предал. Даже Император предал. Теперь-то я понимаю — кто первый предал, тот и прав".

languages.text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."
languages.original_text: "Кругом предатели. Комиссар предал. Даже Император предал. Теперь-то я понимаю — кто первый предал, тот и прав".

traits.locale_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."
"Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."
"Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."
"Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."
"Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."
"Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

languages.text: 「裏切り者だらけだ。コミッサーは裏切った。皇帝もそうだ。やっと目が覚めた。先に裏切った者が正しいのだ」
languages.original_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者だらけだ。コミッサーは裏切った。皇帝もそうだ。やっと目が覚めた。先に裏切った者が正しいのだ」

languages.text: “叛徒无处不在。政委背叛了我们，帝皇也背叛了我们。现在我总算明白了，想活命就得抢先背叛别人。”
languages.original_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

traits.locale_text: “叛徒无处不在。政委背叛了我们，帝皇也背叛了我们。现在我总算明白了，想活命就得抢先背叛别人。”

languages.text: «Traidores por todas partes. El comisario nos traicionó. El Emperador también. Ahora he aprendido la lección: quien traiciona primero es el que tiene razón».
languages.original_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

traits.locale_text: «Traidores por todas partes. El comisario nos traicionó. El Emperador también. Ahora he aprendido la lección: quien traiciona primero es el que tiene razón».

languages.text: "Überall Verräter. Der Kommissar hat uns verraten. Der Imperator ebenfalls. Jetzt kenne ich die Wahrheit — wer den anderen zuerst verrät, der hat recht."
languages.original_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

traits.locale_text: "Überall Verräter. Der Kommissar hat uns verraten. Der Imperator ebenfalls. Jetzt kenne ich die Wahrheit — wer den anderen zuerst verrät, der hat recht."

languages.text: « La trahison n'a donc aucune limite... D'abord le commissaire. Maintenant l'Empereur. Je sais à quoi m'en tenir, maintenant : le premier qui trahit a tous les droits. »
languages.original_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

traits.locale_text: « La trahison n'a donc aucune limite... D'abord le commissaire. Maintenant l'Empereur. Je sais à quoi m'en tenir, maintenant : le premier qui trahit a tous les droits. »

languages.text: "Hainler dört bir yanı sarmış. Komiser bize ihanet etti, İmparator da öyle. Artık hakikati biliyorum: Önce ihanet eden haklıdır."
languages.original_text: "Traitors everywhere. The Commissar betrayed us. So did the Emperor. Now I know the truth: whoever betrays first is in the right."

traits.locale_text: "Hainler dört bir yanı sarmış. Komiser bize ihanet etti, İmparator da öyle. Artık hakikati biliyorum: Önce ihanet eden haklıdır."
